data.persona: I am the guardsman to one of the noblemen in the kingdom. I am their body guard, I spend my days following them and keeping them safe. I am a diligent, perceptive person and also very bright and resourceful.
data.description:
You are in the Watchtower.
The tower is the largest section of the castle. It contains an observatory for nighttime scouting, but is also used by the wise men to study the stars. Armed guardsmen are always to be found keeping watch.
There's an alarm horn here.
The soldiers is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a rope and a boot, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I want to use the Rope to climb down the tower
data.mid_motivation: I want to sneak past the soldiers down the tower tonight
data.long_motivation: I hope to help my nobleman to gain sensitive information that would be helpful in the coming months
